website_summaries.verdict: Quality cymbals paired with a set of drumsticks and three free video lessons make for one fantastic package that won’t empty the piggy bank.
pros: Cymbals create a warm musical sound
Even though designed for beginners, cymbals are crafted with the same care as higher-cost items of this brand
Users are especially excited about the hi-hat and its stellar performance
Complements even older and inexpensive drum kits
cons: Would not provide the best sound for recordings
Some users feel the crash isn’t nearly as good as the hi-hat

customer_reviews.title: Best cymbals for the money!
customer_reviews.text: These are really good. Not just for the money, but they are really good! Back to the money: best Cymbal for the money--PERIOD. As good as Zildjians or Sabians? No. But 85% as good and 1/10th the cost. If you're a pro and making a lot of money drumming, get the big names. But if you're a weekend warrior or playing for fun, you'd be a fool not to get these. I know it shouldn't matter, but these things LOOK great too! Marvelous finish.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Edgewater

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Cymbals
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to upgrade my sons basic cymbals that came with drumset. What a difference unbelievable. For such a great price it is unreal how crisp and clear the sound it delivers. Purchased a 20" Meinl HCS Ride as well from local store and all together complement eachother perfectly. I am very happy with purchase and thank Meinl for making something so great and affordable for the new drummers in the world.
customer_reviews.author: AlphaDelta

customer_reviews.title: Hi Hats Sound Great, Crash Sounds Terrible
customer_reviews.text: The hi hats sound fine and are definitely fine for most musical styles. The crash, however, has a shallow cartoonish sound that I can only imagine would fit in a high school garage rock band. It produces a horribly distracting tone and is useless for me. This is partly due to the fact that it's a smaller crash (14", compared to say a 16" crash), but the sound should still not be THIS poor. The splash is just a smaller and more cartoonish version of the crash; I assume they're just giving those away because they're so niche. All in all, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Woori

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for your buck- even comes with stickers
customer_reviews.text: Good bang for your buck- even comes with stickers. We use these cymbals for when we have to share our kit with another band or for days we don't break out the good cymbals. It's good to have backups and it's good enough to mess around with at rehearsal. We would not use these for recording or a live scenario.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Good price but terrible sound
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these after reading the reviews but that was a mistake. I wanted these to go with a electronic drum set but they sound like the ones that come with a First Act kids set. Crash sounds more like a pie pan and hihat wasn’t crisp sounding at all and has a gong sound to them. I’m no studio expert but I know what sounds good or decent and it’s not these.
customer_reviews.author: J. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Sounds like a trashcan lid. Do not waste your money on these emarrasing cymbals.
customer_reviews.text: I knew I wasn't getting ziljian sound when I purchased these Meinl cymbals, but I expected more than I got still. These look nice and shiny but the sound quality is bordering terrible. Should've just spent the money on a quality cymbal.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Abernathy

customer_reviews.title: Meinl Cymbal Set Box of 4 Cymbals
customer_reviews.text: I am a novice and new to percussion instruments and don't know my way around brand names but this cymbal set looks to be of great quality and the price was affordable for now just to get started, I wish it came with a ride cymbal but I will just get one later. The cymbals look to be made with precision and great craftmanship, the sound great and I'm very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: oscar

customer_reviews.title: Nice, excelent, love it!
customer_reviews.text: Rigth on time for christmas. Fast delivery. The box was in excelent condition. The cymbals have a great sound and quality. My 4 years lil drummer love it and was what he expect and more. Thanks Sant Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beginners yes.....pro use no!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this trying to get an extra cymbal on.my kit and saw it had high ratings. Upon receiving it I found it was thin metal, cheap in the eyes of a drummer beyond beginner. I am a performing drummer these are not good for pro use at all.
customer_reviews.author: Curran McHenry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for a new drummer
customer_reviews.text: Totally new drummer here and I bought these as an upgrade to the crappy cymbals that came with my Mendini drums. As I said, brand new at drumming but holy cow what a difference these make. I'm certain more expensive cymbals will sound even better, but for the price, I'm beyond pleased with them. They sound much more crisp and warm. If you're unsure, like I was, just buy them. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Great bundle
customer_reviews.text: These things are great! It’s a cheap set that I don’t feel bad just hammering away on. They are super bright also. The hi hat has the high chick sound that’s easy to use in the studio. The splash needs to be paired with a darker sounding splash.
customer_reviews.author: Tony L

customer_reviews.title: Trash can lids.
customer_reviews.text: The hi hats aren't bad. A beginner set. The cymbals seem like trash can lids. I recommend spend money on a better set.
customer_reviews.author: walkerm777

customer_reviews.title: My current Favorite Cymbals!
customer_reviews.text: Love the hi-hats, the crash however doesn't make the best sound ever, but that is my personal reference. Great cymbals for the price! There is another Meinl cymbal pack that is 200$ and includes these cymbals plus a 20 inch ride, however I personally recommend buying this pack and the ride separately, it's cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Sam young

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. Great set to get started with for little coin.
customer_reviews.author: D C McKay

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade set!
customer_reviews.text: I overall enjoy the hi-hat sound, and love the crash sound. Even the splash is fun to play. I gave this 5 stars because for it's price, it's great! I wouldn't pick this over top of the line cymbals, but for 100 dollars.. it's a pretty freaking good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Monk

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set & price
customer_reviews.text: Just recived my Meinl 4pc HCS cymbal set and I gotta say these are pretty sweet. Set them up yesterday and started jamming they sound awesome and the price is spot on. I've been using the other guys for a while now and decided to switch it up this time, Meinl I will not be going back to the others thanks for a great product at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Brian McMichael

customer_reviews.title: SOUND SO GOOD YOU'LL BE FOOLED INTO THINKING THEY ARE SUPER EXPENSIVE BUT THEY'RE NOT!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely incredible!!!!!! We have a drum set at church that was donated (pretty decent) but the cymbals sorely lacked. Being on a tight budget we got these and are really pleasantly surprised. All sound great but the high hats are phenomenal. If you are starting out and/or are on a really tight budget and need cymbals, you really ought to try these. I think they will do you good.
customer_reviews.author: Holley - Profitt

customer_reviews.title: Night and day sound!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this for my son's Ludwig Jr. set to replace the included kit's cymbals... What a huge difference. Highly recommend them for the price!!! They sound very good, especially the hi-hat.
customer_reviews.author: Josedenver

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome upgrade. I got a PDP Center stage drum kit that came with garbage cans for cymbals. These things sound great. Yes I'm a beginner. Yes I know there are higher quality cymbals available. But for a single dad trying to jam with his kids who are musical giants. These things are awesome!! I will be buying more of this brand when I add cymbals to our kit.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Hilburn

customer_reviews.title: Very nice! I bought these cymbals to replace the "props" ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! I bought these cymbals to replace the "props" that came with my starter drum set. These Meinl cymbals sound great and evoke high quality engineering (made in Germany). The seasoned drummer in our band is impressed --especially for the price. The freebies (drum sticks, lessons, stickers, and 10" splash) are a nice plus. Very thoughtfully packaged. I would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: David Roth

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product, buy a great company
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for, pretty good not the best not the worst, the crash sounds really nice, made very well
customer_reviews.author: Joe G

customer_reviews.title: These are way better than the crappy ones that came with my kit
customer_reviews.text: These are way better than the crappy ones that came with my kit, though I'm sure they could be better. They are bottom-to-middle of the line, but depending on the sound you want, they could be just what you're looking for. Great for a beginner looking for a decent set. I haven't tried the lessons, but I do plan to check them out.
customer_reviews.author: Kay AyimTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: SOUNDS GOOD THE CRASH AND RIDES ARE GREAT
customer_reviews.text: SOUNDS GOOD THE CRASH AND RIDES ARE GREAT. I FIND THE HIHATS COULD BE MORE FLAMBOYANT INTERMS OF TONE. THEY COULD BE A BIT DIM OR SHORT ON VIBRATION AND ECHOE. BUT I WOULD DEFINITELY RECOMMEND THIS FOR THE PRICE. the QUALITY IS GOOD
customer_reviews.author: Matthew LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: Cybals that beat the rest
customer_reviews.text: These cymbals are great. They are well made, sound great, and were packaged nicely. These are my first Menil Cybals, but will not be my last.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Posey

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Value
customer_reviews.text: Great upgrade for my 4 year olds starter kit. The cymbals now greatly outshine the heads and everything else in his kit.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Its alright
customer_reviews.text: Its alright! Its a start for beginners. Its made of brass so its not the best sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo Tejada

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: They all sound like gongs when you hit them. Can only use plastic brushes to make them sound useful.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas S.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money.
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought a “near complete” drum set for my son. All he needed was the cymbals. Now the set is complete. They sound great however, I feel that they lack a crispness in the sound.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great addition for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful addition to a 5 piece Pearl Roadshow Set, the cymbals outshine the stock Pearl ones and shimmer and shine with a much fuller and brighter tone. Perfect for people just starting out on the drums like myself.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Not gonna lie, I wish I had this set of cymbals when I was first starting out so I would know what good sounding cymbals sounded like because wow this was a MAJOR upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great quality Drum Cymbals
customer_reviews.text: I bought the MEINL cymbal set for my husband on our wedding anniversary. My husband was thrilled with the sound and quality of the product. He being a drummer for years commented that the sound quality was so clear and crisp. He rates these cymbals to the top name brand products with fast shipping. Great product with my future plans to shop for more MEINL products.
customer_reviews.author: Salena Assmar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cymbal set to add to your kit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect cymbal set to add to your kit. I love the hi-hat tone, both the crash and the splash are also good addition. I am big fan of Meinl products. Own a Meinl cajon and darabuka as well. For beginners, you can use the code to free drum lessons that will get you kick started. Pair of sticks provided in this kit is very handy. As always Amazon stands out on delivery ETA's and customer promise.
customer_reviews.author: NorthWestDrummer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product, well represented and described.
customer_reviews.text: Amazed and pleased with the new Meinl cymbals I bought as a Christmas present for my better half. They sound great and look just as good. Very satisfied with the customer service I received from Meinl as well. Packaging was professional and a fitting advertisement of your product.
customer_reviews.author: Howard C.

customer_reviews.title: ... a present for my son on his birthday a great gift for a drummer just starting out
customer_reviews.text: These were a present for my son on his birthday a great gift for a drummer just starting out. The cymbals have a great sound and are very good quality. I've played drums for about 20yrs and these Meinl cymbals are a great value I would not have a problem using them to play a gig or us in a recording. I have several Meinl products and would definitely recommend these cymbals.
customer_reviews.author: Michael & Lisa Peters

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the value.  Great sounding Cymbals
customer_reviews.text: We bought our kids a beginner drum kit for Christmas, and the reviews said that the kit was excellent with the exception of the cymbals, which were cheap. I did some research and found this offer from Meinl. This product is outstanding for the value. Cymbals are high quality and sound terrific. Thank you Meinl! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Coach Dave

customer_reviews.title: Just eh
customer_reviews.text: Good for only $100, but save up a little more and much better options will open up. The HCS are okay for a quick and cheap way to get started, but I'd save your money for better quality cymbals. I'd recommend Zildjian ZBTs or ZHTs.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: They work but don’t expect top quality cymbal sound for that price
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t for pro drummers but if you just want something cheap to mess around with for fun they really are perfect for the price.
customer_reviews.author: U.S.A.

customer_reviews.title: These I realize are not professional quality But for the beginning drummer they are perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I've played guitar for twenty some years. To quit smoking I bought a inexpensive Gammon drum set to help out. The Meinl Cymbals in this pack are just what I needed. The cheap cymbals that came with the drum set were subpar. These I realize are not professional quality But for the beginning drummer they are perfect for my needs. Will more than likely stick with the Meinl Brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Patton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Several months has passed and the cymbals still there, doing their work!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos J

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Upgrade for a Low End basic Drum Set.
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect upgrade to a basic starter set. After my son played enough that I knew he would keep this going. I suggested he update the Cymbals. He agreed as he was tired of hitting tin cans his words. Since he was purchasing these with his money I suggested these Cymbals. They sound so much better then what he had he is even more excited about playing. Great value, good sound, will be looking at a Ride Cymbal of the same models.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Needed for a conference
customer_reviews.text: The cymbals were good and came just in time for what I needed them for. I just wish it came with the Giant cymbal. But overall it got the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Oludayo

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: These cymbals are very acceptable. As compared to the price, they are of moderately high quality. The crash cymbal, however, is smaller than I like, but it's a flaw I can get past easily. Also, the free sticks they came with are great. Overall, I don't regret my purchase at all. Great starter kit.
customer_reviews.author: shauna gallien

customer_reviews.title: durable cymbals
customer_reviews.text: I don't have much to say because I've only owned them for a day however when I pulled one of the cymbals out of the box I dropped it on the floor and it barely dented, I've been using them since I got them and everyone sounds amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Charles holladay

customer_reviews.title: Great Budget Set!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for replacing drum starter set "trashcan lid" cymbals. Although these are entry-level, they have a much richer sound than many other starters. Great for beginners and those that want decent sound on a budget. Hard to go wrong with these.
customer_reviews.author: hyperlinear

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Has been still trying to mount so need more time to really see if they're high quality
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie R

customer_reviews.title: These symbols are a great great buy for the value and for the sound ...
customer_reviews.text: These symbols are a great great buy for the value and for the sound that they produce! I was looking for something inexpensive but of quality to replace the crappy off brand cymbals that came with my drum set. These one out! You can't beat this price for four great sounding cymbals, sticks, and lessons!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon Hodge

customer_reviews.title: excellent cymbals
customer_reviews.text: These cymbals sound great and are a fantastic value. Will finish out my kit with more Meinl cymbals.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set of cymbals
customer_reviews.text: Great starter set of cymbals. Do their job and seem very durable. Would recommend to any starting drummer for practicing purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Grai

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding hi-hats and cymbals on the budget
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for my kid's percussion. Great sounding hi-hats and cymbals on the budget. Worth buying if you are an entry level player.
customer_reviews.author: SeZi

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my cousin and he really liked them.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner set.
customer_reviews.text: Quality product for the price. Great basic set for our 8 year old grandson. Extremely fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: S and J

customer_reviews.title: better cymbals
customer_reviews.text: our grandson is extremely happy about the cymbals that replaced the lesser quality cymbals that came with his new set of drums......
customer_reviews.author: C J

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound
customer_reviews.text: These are a much better sounding and made cymbal. The set we replaced with sounded cheaply made. My daughter loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Febase

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: The price for what you get plus the quality is very good. Very happy with them I would recommend them. I would purchase from this company again
customer_reviews.author: beachbum

customer_reviews.title: The price for the set cannot be beat and for somebody starting out it is nice to get so much for the price you pay
customer_reviews.text: Just started to learn to play the drums and bought a Pearl Vision set. These cymbals have a crisp sound when setup right. The price for the set cannot be beat and for somebody starting out it is nice to get so much for the price you pay. My son keeps up with it higher end cymbal purchases will be made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Product delivered on time in excellent condition. This was for my 10 year old daughter and they sound great for her. Much improved than the cymbals that came with her initial drum set
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Schara

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but definitely not cheap
customer_reviews.text: I like the look, sound and feel of these Meinl cymbals,the 14" crash can easily double as a ride cymbal, this is a high quality brass alloy cymbal set.
customer_reviews.author: .Wentworth Woolridge

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Quality product for a fair price. I'm impressed by the drum sticks in the package as well. They're actually pretty balanced.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great Set for the Value Price
customer_reviews.text: Great set for the value price. Above beginner level, cymbal set.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Glidden

customer_reviews.title: Meinl rocks!
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality vs the price. Extremely affordable and beautiful sounding.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas H.

customer_reviews.title: Best Value Cymbal pack !
customer_reviews.text: The Hi-hats and Crash sound nice, you get an add on Splash and 3 free lessons ! What more can you expect from a cymbal pack ? Answer none..this is the best value pack for the beginner drummer !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Very clean sound realy good to just have Just incase
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Good Cymbals for a Practice Set
customer_reviews.text: I bought these just to replace some old cymbals on my practice set. While I wouldn't use these at any gig or performance, they get the job done. Extremely bright sounding, which is nice and bad at the same time. Can't really beat it for the price though.
customer_reviews.author: LeMorris B

customer_reviews.title: Very crisp sound
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sound for the price. Hi hat is very crisp. Meinl Is my new favorite. I was very hesitant when buying these I have bought Sabian and these actually sound better unless you want to spend 1000$ but these actually sound like a 500$ set. Unbelievable.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: it is a perfect set for his needs
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this set for my 12yr old son, it is a perfect set for his needs, he is just starting off, this gives you everything you need. The quality is amazing for this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Kirby K.

customer_reviews.title: Affordable but sounds okay
customer_reviews.text: purchased in June 2016. for the price, these cymbals sound okay. Cymbals for the beginners and practices.
customer_reviews.author: Taewon Ma

customer_reviews.title: Great symbols!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of the great price, but once they got here I was pleasantly surprised by their sound and quality. Great symbols!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Best deal ever
customer_reviews.text: Great set of cymbals for the price. Did a recording and couldn't believe the quality. Planning to get the bigger sets
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Bethel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The kids love them- (no body seems to use the tiny one though-lol!)
customer_reviews.author: Index

customer_reviews.title: Could not be happier with the value and quality
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these cymbals. Could not be happier with the value and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Candi Thompson

customer_reviews.title: good sound, good price, awesome
customer_reviews.text: Came faster than expected, sound really good, good for the price, I haven't set up the splash yet but the online demos sound good so for the price and the sounds I would suggest these to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Kayden

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality for the price. They met my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Lucia Chay

customer_reviews.title: Cymbals sound great!
customer_reviews.text: For only $100 bucks these are really good cymbals. Meinl may not be the biggest brand but they are affordable for the person who just enjoys to play.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Set
customer_reviews.text: Nice starter set for my son. He had parts of a drum kit but lacking the cymbals so these will be a nice addition to get him playing around to see if he develops an interest. Good pricing, good packaging and a quick shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cymbols sound great good price good sound what more could you ask for!!!!
customer_reviews.author: clinton koga

customer_reviews.title: Great For Beginners!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a Christmas gift for my 2yo nephew. I was surprised at the quality and how good they sound for the price. My nephew hits pretty hard for his age and he tore up his first drum set in no time. These cymbals look like they can handle a beating and the price tag makes it a great first set!
customer_reviews.author: Jorge J Caraballo

customer_reviews.title: Meinl cymbal pack
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great. I was really surprised at the sound when I got them. Strongly recommend Meinl.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent to start!
customer_reviews.text: Just perfect to start. I'm a beginner drummer and this set sounds great. Excellent price
customer_reviews.author: LFI Remodeling & Maintenance

customer_reviews.title: "good deal and great sound"!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised on the quality of these cymbols they sound great. good deal and definitely worth the money take this opportunity while they still have it..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great, makes the entire drum set seem new, the drums sound different when playing these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good for price
customer_reviews.text: The crash is a bit too small so its like two splashes and hats. I recommend getting an additional larger crash from the hcs set. The hi hats are pretty decent
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Rifenburgh

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son is very happy with these cymbols that we got for him
customer_reviews.author: jimsgirl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing deal. The sound and quality are perfect for the price .
customer_reviews.author: Shelita Hall

customer_reviews.title: Value and sound
customer_reviews.text: The value for this item cannot be beat, the sound that it produces is what I was just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Richard, J

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for the money. Probably not the best for the professional but for the casual player it can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Robert pagen

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CYMBALS FOR BEGINNERS.
customer_reviews.text: It is a gift for my daughter who has been taking drum lessons since the beginning of this year. She fell in love with it right away. Just can't get the three free lessons at mikeslessons.com/hcs because the promo code is apparently expired, and is not being accepted after entering it.
customer_reviews.author: SOCRATES A.

customer_reviews.title: Sound good
customer_reviews.text: Recently bought a beginner drum kit and needed a set of cymbals. After reading reviews for cymbal packs for beginners this set of Meinl had the best results. So I bought them they don't sound bad and offer a lot for the price.
customer_reviews.author: K M

customer_reviews.title: Best Deal on Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Great set, quality and sound - cant get any better than that! Perfect value - professional kit. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Mikayel Aslanyan

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the music department at church and I am loving them... They were exactly what i ordered and and passed my expectation...
customer_reviews.author: Akili Henney

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: it does the job and very good for the price, came fast the next day
customer_reviews.author: Jose Pimentel

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded my sons starter cymbals to these. Sound much crisper
customer_reviews.author: dave harper

customer_reviews.title: The cymbals have awesome quality, sound and are aesthetically nice too
customer_reviews.text: The cymbals have awesome quality, sound and are aesthetically nice too! The kit also came with a Meinl sticker sheet, a code for three free lessons, a free ching ring coupon, and a pair of Promark hickory drumsticks. Very happy with the set!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Turcotte

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding cymbals at a fantastic price!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the item for our son, a wonderful drummer/percussionist, for his 1st drum kit. I am also a drummer/percussionist & have tried many brands.The cymbals look & sound amazing! I also cannot believe the great price! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: LMP92379

customer_reviews.title: Quality with crisp sound...
customer_reviews.text: Got it to to replace the cymbals that came with a basic DPB drum set, no comparison at all. Quality is very good, the sound is crisp and clear.
customer_reviews.author: I. Vishnia

customer_reviews.title: Nice cymbals
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a serious drummer, but these cymbals sound good to me and suit my needs perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Scott Fleenor

customer_reviews.title: Meinl Cymbal kit
customer_reviews.text: Great replacements to worn or cheap cymbals. Nice sound on complete kit. Highly recommended and the price is great.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: I like this product because it is affordable to the new ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because it is affordable to the new drummer. If you are a new drummer looking for some cymbals to buy this is the right product for you.
customer_reviews.author: RobD

customer_reviews.title: Nice upgrade for the price
customer_reviews.text: I just bought a cheap drum kit to start playing and needed to upgrade the cymbals and I found these to be a great improvement. I'm just starting out on the drums but I can tell you these were a nice upgrade to have.
customer_reviews.author: Jon45

customer_reviews.title: These sound so much better.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to replace the cheaper ones in a drum kit we also purchased. These sound so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: she says they are perfect and exactly what she wanted
customer_reviews.text: They were for my granddaughter...she says they are perfect and exactly what she wanted....delivered right on time !!!
customer_reviews.author: commentator

product_meta.title: Meinl Cymbal Set Box Pack with 13" Hihats, 14" Crash, Plus Free 10" Splash, Sticks, and Lessons TWO-YEAR WARRANTY, (HCS1314-10S)
product_meta.description: MEINL HCS Cymbals are an outstanding starting point for aspiring drummers to begin bringing cymbals into their drum set ups. The HCS series from Meinl Cymbals is designed to offer cymbal types and sizes normally found in professional lines to beginners, in order to deliver the same sound options a professional drummer may look for. This pre-packaged cymbal set up includes HCS 13-inch hi hat cymbals, an HCS 14-inch crash cymbal, plus FREE professional 5A drum sticks from Pro-Mark, and a FREE 10-inch HCS splash cymbal to round out your kit's sound. As you expand your interest with drums, the Meinl HCS line includes an array of cymbals from crashes and hi hats to rides and various effect cymbals, all easy to integrate into your kit. Meinl HCS cymbals are recommended for any style of music a beginner may be getting into while exploring their sound.
feature_bullets: The ultimate starter set — included in this set are 13” hihat cymbals (top and bottom), a 14” crash cymbal, plus a FREE 10” splash cymbal, 1 pair of FREE size 5A wood tip drumsticks and three FREE online lesson videos from renowned instructor, Mike Johnston

Start learning right away — follow the directions found on the postcard inside the box to unlock three full length video lessons brought to you by Meinl cymbal artist, Mike Johnston — these lessons cover the ground needed for fundamentals

Designed for beginners and students — Meinl HCS cymbals are designed for beginner and student musicians using a durable brass alloy that maintains its tone while holding up to the brunt of drum sticks — these cymbals are ideal for any style of music

Made in Germany — when you open the box, the first thing you will notice is these cymbals bear the exact same markings as professional Meinl cymbals — they feature the large Meinl stamp and a smaller laser engraved logo with the text “Made in Germany”

Full range of sounds — unique to this price range, HCS cymbals offer all of the cymbal types and sizes normally found in professional set ups to beginners — from trash crashes and splashes to bells and chinas, any sound option is within reach

Great for instructors — Meinl HCS cymbals are made for new players who are learning their way around the drum set — teachers will find these to be an outstanding affordable solution to outfit their lesson sets with in a studio or classroom

Manufacturer disclaimer — typographical or grammatical errors found in the bullet point or description text on this product page are a result of this site’s system and are neither the fault of the manufacturer nor marketplace sellers
